Translated_Text: The mother gave medicine to her son.

Primary_Text: uurɨ, uu-i-ʔsaʔ sɨrɨrɨ, pɨretɨku-ja uj-ene-ʔsaʔ sɨrɨrɨ, tarɨ-waja
Analyzed_Word: uurɨ	uu-i-ʔsaʔ	sɨrɨrɨ	pɨretɨku-ja	uj-ene-ʔsaʔ	sɨrɨrɨ	tarɨ-waja
Translated_Text: I, I came. The frog brought me here.
He killed himself with a knife.
I went to weave a basket.
There is something that eats people.
I thought it was in your talk.
The woman that I saw went.
